definition[0]: the process by which you gain knowledge or learn a skill
definition[1]: the act of getting land, power, money etc
example[1]: the acquisition of new sites for development
definition[2]: something that you have obtained by buying it or being given it
example[2]: The Art Society is holding an exhibition of recent acquisitions.
definition[3]: when one company buys another one, or part of another one
example[3]: the group’s acquisition of 85 stores in California
definition[4]: a company or part of a company that is bought by another company
example[4]: The group’s latest acquisition is a sportswear firm.
